attributes.action: Close the Entice Strippers Club in Southend
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS Healthcare provided to the Mentally Ill in Southend is bad enough without forcing them to look at a Strippers Club as they go in for their appointments. It sends a mixed message about what the values of the town really are,and is a depressing sight for people who are already depressed,as it suggests that the prevailing attitude in Southend is Sleazy and Superficial rather than Understanding & Compassionate.
http://www.echo-news.co.uk/news/15517776.Lap_dancing_club_is_given_a_new_licence/
attributes.background: Along with existing but disregarded concerns raised at Council about this Club dragging down the reputation of the town by approving unsavoury behaviour, the Club has been built directly next door to "The Taylor Centre", which is Southend's Psychiatric Clinic. Where traumatised women will see it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
